name: Chuul Spore Servant

action.name: Multiattack
text: The spore servant makes two pincer attacks.

action.name: Pincer
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (Escape DC 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the spore servant doesn't have two other creatures grappled.

description: Source: Out of the Abyss p. 228
